original_text: Moreover, this they have done to me: they have defiled my sanctuary on the same day and profaned my Sabbaths.
korean_text: 이 외에도 그들이 내게 행한 것이 있나니 당일에 내 성소를 더럽히며 내 안식일을 범하였도다

sentences.original_text: this they have done to me:
they have defiled my sanctuary on the same day
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 같은 날에 나의 성소를 더럽혔으며
